item.description:

I request a ban on ruler, all he does is try to cause trouble and be a little bitch about everything.

This is a serious request.
[/quote][quote author=jme link=topic=277439.msg2277303#msg2277303 date=1213511590]
ruler is gay[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2008, 08:53:18 PM[/size][hr]Haha, i hurt his feelings and he reported me


[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2008, 07:20:29 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=285991.msg2316453#msg2316453 date=1215310570]
Hi my names ruler and i expect the world to revolve around me.
[/quote]
no i just expect the rules that apply to me be applied to the staff.[/quote]

Why do you think I called you gay in that pic? Would it have anything to do with it being another one of your stupid threads like this one?

item.title: Demote Frank_ from IRC Admin
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:8, topic:217608”][quote]
[center] Please do not insult inbred people like that.[/center]
[/quote]
I would like to report the staff member that warned Yz85Racer. The staff member further tries to imply i am inbred. And in doing so is breaking rules in which he/she is suppose to enforce. I remember the rules are tighter on community members verse normal members. I would hope the rules on the staff are tighter than community members.[/quote]

Or you can look at it how I did, you’re such a fucking idiot that by calling you inbred, it is insulting people who are actually inbred.

Read full topic

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:2, topic:217608”]That’s what happens when you’re inbred, ruler.
[center] Please do not insult inbred people like that.[/center][/quote]

[center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Please do not insult inbred people like that.[/center]
I would like to report the staff member that warned Yz85Racer. The staff member further tries to imply i am inbred. And in doing so is breaking rules in which he/she is suppose to enforce. I remember the rules are tighter on community members verse normal members. I would hope the rules on the staff are tighter than community members.

[quote=“frank_, post:6, topic:217608”]1) learn to copy without formatting codes
2) dont harrass jagex
3) dont be a fucking retard[/quote]

  1. explain futher.
  2. They started it by sending me threats, ect. things i can’t talk about publicly or disclose fully. Jagex should have a phone number for its users, I believe most other games of its size/genre do.
Freddy1990:

Hmm, I dunno, frank can be a bit… well… you know what I mean, but all I ever see ruler do around here is complain…

fair
